metadata.title: CVE-2020-6104 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description: An exploitable information disclosure vulnerability exists in the get_dnode_of_data functionality of F2fs-Tools F2fs.Fsck 1.13. A specially crafted f2fs filesystem can cause information disclosure resulting in a information disclosure. An attacker can provide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: f2fs-tools package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
